```mermaid
        note over Sender: Stratum Level (0-7): 8 bits
        note over Sender: Reference Clock ID (8-39): 32 bits

    deactivate Receiver

    activate Sender
```


prompt: Construct a packet diagram for a command packet: Command ID (0-15), Parameter 1 (16-31), Parameter 2 (32-47), Parameter 3 (48-63), and Checksum (64-79).
output:
```mermaid
sequenceDiagram
    participant Sender
    participant Receiver

    Note over Sender, Receiver: Command Packet Structure (80 bits total)

    rect rgb(230, 230, 230)
    Note over Sender, Receiver:
        Command ID (4 bits, 0-15)
        Parameter 1 (16 bits, 16-31)
        Parameter 2 (16 bits, 32-47)
        Parameter 3 (16 bits, 48-63)
        Checksum (16 bits, 64-79)
    end rect

    Sender->>Receiver: Command Packet (80 bits)
    Note right of Sender: Packet Construction
    Note left of Receiver: Packet Reception & Processing

    Receiver->>Receiver: Checksum Verification (64-79)
    alt Checksum Valid
        Receiver->>Receiver: Process Command (Command ID, Parameters)
    else Checksum Invalid
        Receiver->>Sender: NACK (Negative Acknowledgement)
        Sender->>Receiver: Resend Command Packet (80 bits)
    end
```
